HPCL-MS-0001.title: E20 MS
HPCL-MS-0001.subTitle: MOTOR FUEL
HPCL-MS-0001.description: Motor Spirit (also known as Motor Gasoline) is a distillate fraction, normally boiling within the range 30°C to 210°C. It is a complex mixture composed of relatively volatile hydrocarbons (alkanes, alkenes and aromatics with typical carbon chain length of C5 to C10) that vary widely in their physical and chemical properties.

specifications.property: Water tolerance of motor gasoline-alcohol blends
specifications.value: temperature for phase separation, °C, Max 10 (other months) / 0 (winter)
Max, 15 (Ethers containing 5 or more ‘C’ atoms per molecules such as MTBE, ETBE or TAME) / Not permitted (Any other oxygenates)

HPCL-MS-0001.appData: Primarily used in transportation (Cars, Sport Utility Vehicles, Motorcycles and Scooters). E20 Fuel was launched in India on 6th Feb 2023. As on date regular MS is substituted by E20 MS. It is observed that E20 fuel is being used in existing spark-ignition engine. E20 fuel has several advantages over conventional MS, such as it reduces vehicular tailpipe emissions by lowering the carbon monoxide, hydrocarbons and nitrogen oxides levels.

HPCL-MS-0002.title: HSD (High Speed Diesel )
HPCL-MS-0002.subTitle: MOTOR FUEL
HPCL-MS-0002.description: High-Speed Diesel (HSD), also known as Automotive Diesel Fuel, is produced from the fractional distillation of crude oil between 200°C and 400°C resulting in a mixture of carbon chains and is composed of saturated hydrocarbons and aromatic hydrocarbons.

specifications.property: Carbon residue (Ramsbottom or micro) on 10 % residue
Oxidation stability (for diesel fuel having FAME content of above 2 percent v/v)
Oxidation stability (for diesel fuel having FAME content of above 2 percent v/v)

specifications.value: wear scar diameter (wsd) at 60 ºC, μm, Max 460

HPCL-MS-0002.appData: HSD is commonly used as a fuel in medium and high-speed compression ignition engine in commercial vehicle, stationery diesel engines, locomotive and pumps etc. It is also used as fuel in power generation (DG sets), agriculture and construction machinery.

HPCL-MS-0003.title: Ethanol
HPCL-MS-0003.subTitle: FUEL ADDITIVE FOR MS
HPCL-MS-0003.description:
Ethanol meant for E20 blending having purity of min. 99.5% and other components including water max. 0.5%. Anhydrous Ethanol is known as Ethyl Alcohol, is a clear, colourless and homogenous liquid with high purity, also known as Absolute Alcohol. 
Anhydrous Ethanol is categorized into 1G and 2G, based on its source of raw material used. 1G Ethanol produced from raw materials viz. sugarcane juice, molasses, damaged food grains. 2G Ethanol are generally made from biomass. 1G Ethanol is produced by subsidiary unit HPCL-MS--Biofuel Ltd.
HPCL-MS-0003.appData: Ethanol is an environment friendly fuel used for blending with Motor Spirit (MS).

HPCL-MS-0004.title: Kerosene
HPCL-MS-0004.subTitle: FUEL
HPCL-MS-0004.description: Kerosene is distillate fractions of crude oil in the boiling range of 150-250°C. It is a complex mixture of hydrocarbons from crude oil distillation, primarily containing alkanes (paraffins), cycloalkanes (naphthenes) and some aromatics like alkylbenzenes.

specifications.property: Colour Saybolt (in case of undyed Kerosene)
Colour Visual (in case of dyed Kerosene)

specifications.value: Not limited, but to be reported

HPCL-MS-0004.appData:
Kerosene is one of the most versatile hydrocarbon fuels in the industry. Kerosene is used in many industrial applications like heating, cleaning and as thinner. It is also used for lighting lamps in areas where electricity is not available. Use of Public Distribution System (PDS) Kerosene (Blue Dyed) has reduced drastically. 
Kerosene with ultra-low sulfur content upto 10 mg/kg is used as pipeline compatible plug material (PCK) in multi-product pipeline operations in Petroleum Industry. Chemical industry uses kerosene as a petroleum solvent and in pesticide industry.
HPCL-MS-0004.industrial: Domestic Use, Petroleum Industry. Chemical Industry & Pesticide industry

HPCL-MS-0005.title: ATF (Jet A-1) (Aviation Turbine Fuel Jet A-1)
HPCL-MS-0005.subTitle: AVIATION FUEL
HPCL-MS-0005.description: Aviation Turbine Fuel is a colorless, combustible, straight-run petroleum distillate, kerosene-based fuel. Kerosene makes up the majority of Jet A-1, with trace amounts of additives.

specifications.value: ATF (Jet A-1) (Aviation Turbine Fuel Jet A-1)

HPCL-MS-0005.appData: ATF Jet A-1 is used for aircrafts (Military jets) and Civil Aviation sector worldwide. It is a higher quality fuel subjected to stringent Quality Control norms set by DGCA and DGAQA.

HPCL-MS-0006.title: HP Turbojet
HPCL-MS-0006.subTitle: MOTOR FUEL
HPCL-MS-0006.description: HP Turbojet is premium branded fuel produced by addition of special high quality additives which enhances overall performance of High Speed Diesel.
HPCL-MS-0006.appData: Used as a fuel in medium and high-speed compression ignition engines in high-end vehicles.

HPCL-IF-0001.title: LAN (Low Aromatic Naphtha)
HPCL-IF-0001.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FEEDSTOCK/FUEL
HPCL-IF-0001.description: Petroleum naphtha is a complex mixture of hydrocarbons, primarily C5–C8 alkanes (paraffins), cycloparaffins, and aromatics, with specific compositions varying significantly based on the crude oil source and refining process. It contains higher percentage of paraffins and low percentage of aromatic hydrocarbons (such as benzene, toluene, and xylene). It also contains sulfur compounds.
HPCL-IF-0001.appData: Naphtha is used by refineries in blending of petroleum products, isomerization, reforming, and in the production of value-added products. Naphtha serves as a primary feedstock for the production of gasoline. It is also a crucial component in the manufacturing of various petrochemical products, including plastics, fertilizers, and synthetic fibres. Naphtha is a key raw material for the production of various plastics, including polyethylene (PE), polypropylene (PP), and polystyrene (PS).

HPCL-IF-0002.title: FOOD GRADE HEXANE
HPCL-IF-0002.subTitle: PROCESS SOLVENT
HPCL-IF-0002.description: Food Grade Hexane is a highly purified petroleum distillate fraction that contains a high proportion of n-hexane with boiling range of 63 to 70°C. It is a clear colourless liquid with distinct odour, free from sediment, suspended matter and moisture.
HPCL-IF-0002.appData: Food Grade Hexane is used in Food processing industry as a solvent to extract edible oils with minimum harmful residue to meet strict purity standards set by statutory bodies such as FSSAI. It is also used in Drug and Pharmaceuticals industry for drug extraction and as a cleaning agent.

HPCL-IF-0003.title: Solvent 1425
HPCL-IF-0003.subTitle: PROCESS SOLVENT
HPCL-IF-0003.description: Solvent 1425 is a petroleum-derived industrial solvent having a complex mixture of petroleum hydrocarbons that vary widely in their physical and chemical properties with boiling range between 50 - 120°C. Solvent 1425 is having strong solvency power due to its wide chemical composition. Solvent 1425 is having higher evaporation rate that improves efficiency of the solvent.

specifications.property: Distillation 50 % by volume recovered at, in °C
Distillation 95 % by volume recovered at, in °C

HPCL-IF-0003.appData: Solvent 1425 is a highly versatile hydrocarbon solvent with a wide range of industrial and commercial applications. Solvent 1425 is a potent degreaser, effectively removing oil, grease, wax, and tar from various surfaces. It is commonly used in cleaning engines, parts and tools. Solvent 1425 finds application in the paint and coatings industry. It is used for diluting paints, varnishes, and lacquers to adjust viscosity and improve application. Solvent 1425 as a cleaning and degreasing agent in leather and rubber industry.

HPCL-IF-0004.title: MTO (Mineral Turpentine Oil) / Solvent 2445
HPCL-IF-0004.subTitle: PROCESS SOLVENT
HPCL-IF-0004.description: Solvent 2445, commonly referred to as MTO, is a petroleum-derived aliphatic hydrocarbon solvent obtained from the middle distillate/naphtha range. It is a water-white, highly volatile, low-viscosity solvent used extensively in paints, adhesives, and chemical industries. It has boiling range between 125 - 240°C.

specifications.property: Distillation 50 % by volume recovered at, in °C
Distillation 95 % by volume recovered at, in °C

HPCL-IF-0004.appData: Solvent 2445 is a versatile and widely used solvent with significant applications across industries. Solvent 2445's high solvency power, low toxicity, moderate evaporation rate, and inertness make it a valuable substance in various cleaning, degreasing, and dissolving processes. Its unique properties make it an essential component in the formulation of paints, adhesives, inks, and numerous other products.

HPCL-IF-0005.title: FO (MV2 Grade)
HPCL-IF-0005.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FUEL
HPCL-IF-0005.description: Fuel oil is a dark viscous residual fuels obtained by blending mainly heavier components from crude distillation unit. It is generally consisted of heavy petroleum product. Efficiency and type of fuel oil widely varies depending on kinematic viscosity and sulphur content.

specifications.value: Not limited, but to be reported

specifications.property: Density at 15°C kg/m3 or Relative density at 15.6/15.6°C
specifications.value: Not limited, but to be reported

HPCL-IF-0005.appData: Fuel oil is used as a backup fuel for power generation in facilities where a reliable power supply is crucial. It is used in thermal power plants for boiler start up. It serves as a contingency option during periods of fuel shortages or interruptions in primary fuel sources. Fuel oil is used in various industrial applications for heating purposes. Cement and Steel plants use fuel oil as a source of energy in furnaces for high heat processes.
HPCL-IF-0005.industrial: Power, Marine, Manufacturing (Steel, Cement, Glass, Ceramic Industries)

HPCL-IF-0006.title: Heating Oil (LDO)
HPCL-IF-0006.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FUEL
HPCL-IF-0006.description: Heating Oil also known as Light Diesel Oil (LDO) consists of medium length chains of hydrogen and carbon mainly alkanes, cycloalkanes, aromatics and oils. Basically, Heating oil is termed for medium commercial extracts from crude oil. It is either distilled or residual fraction of various oils that is extracted while distillation. It has a lower flash point compared to heavier Fuel Oil (FO), for easier ignition.

specifications.value: on whole samples, percent by mass, Max 1.5

HPCL-IF-0006.appData: LDO is known for its efficient combustion properties. This fuel is free flowing in nature. It is largely an industrial fuel. It finds extensive use in industries such as manufacturing, power generation, and heating systems. It is commonly used in boilers, furnaces, and other equipment that require a steady and controlled source of heat.

HPCL-IF-0007.title: HFHSD (High Flash High Speed Diesel - Distillate Marine Fuel )
HPCL-IF-0007.subTitle: MARINE FUEL
HPCL-IF-0007.description: High Flash High Speed Diesel (HFHSD) is a special grade of diesel fuel with flash point (Min. 66°C) significantly higher than that of HSD (Min. 35°C). It consists of hydrocarbons with carbon numbers predominantly in the range of C9 to C28, with a boiling range of approximately 150°C to 400°C. It is produced by refining middle-distillate fractions to meet stringent safety and performance specifications IS 16731(ISO 8217).

specifications.property: Carbon residue – Micro method on the 10 % volume distillation residue

specifications.value: corrected wear scar diameter (WSD) at 60 °C, μm, Max 520

HPCL-IF-0007.appData: HFHSD is mainly manufactured for non-automotive applications. It is mainly applicable for marine use by Indian Navy, Merchant Ships, fishing vessels etc. where a high flash point diesel is required.

HPCL-IF-0008.title: VLSFO (Very Low Sulfur Fuel Oil) RMG380
HPCL-IF-0008.subTitle: MARINE FUEL
HPCL-IF-0008.description: VLSFO is a type of marine fuel that complies with the International Maritime Organization (IMO) – Marine Oil Pollution Control (MARPOL) regulations to reduce sulphur emissions from ships. It is generally blended from different refinery streams to achieve low sulfur levels while maintaining suitable viscosity and energy content for ship engines. VLSFO is a cleaner marine fuel with very low sulfur content (0.5% by wt. max./as per statutory norms) and prescribed limit of element content in fuel (Na, V, Al, Si, Ca, Zn, P).
HPCL-IF-0008.appData: VLSFO is primarily used as a marine fuel in ships to comply with IMO regulations. VLSFO is used in various types of vessels, including container ships, bulk carriers, etc.

HPCL-IF-0009.title: LSHS (Low Sulphur Heavy Stock)
HPCL-IF-0009.subTitle: INDUSTRIAL FUEL
HPCL-IF-0009.description: Low Sulphur Heavy Stock (LSHS) is a dense, viscous residual product from crude oil distillation, featuring a black, thick liquid form with Low Sulfur (Max. 1.8%) content as per customer requirement.
HPCL-IF-0009.appData: LSHS is used mainly in heavy industry, steel plants, and power plants as fuel. LSHS is mainly used in steel production and where the finished product to be heated are likely to get contaminated with sulfur.

HPCL-IF-0010.title: Paving Bitumen (VG10)
HPCL-IF-0010.subTitle: ROAD CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL
HPCL-IF-0010.description: Bitumen is obtained as the last residue in fractional distillation of crude petroleum. It is defined as a viscous liquid, or a solid, consisting essentially of complex mixture of hydrocarbons including high-molecular-weight compounds, such as asphaltenes, and lighter fractions, such as aromatics and saturates. It is substantially non-volatile and softens gradually when heated. It is black or brown in colour & possesses waterproofing and adhesive properties.
HPCL-IF-0010.appData: Paving bitumen is extensively used in the construction of roads, highways and airport tarmac.

HPCL-IF-0011.title: Paving Bitumen (VG30)
HPCL-IF-0011.subTitle: ROAD CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL
HPCL-IF-0011.description: Bitumen is obtained as the last residue in fractional distillation of crude petroleum. It is defined as a viscous liquid, or a solid, consisting essentially of complex mixture of hydrocarbons including high-molecular-weight compounds, such as asphaltenes, and lighter fractions, such as aromatics and saturates. It is substantially non-volatile and softens gradually when heated. It is black or brown in colour & possesses waterproofing and adhesive properties.
HPCL-IF-0011.appData: Paving bitumen is extensively used in the construction of roads, highways and airport tarmac.

HPCL-IF-0012.title: Paving Bitumen (VG40)
HPCL-IF-0012.subTitle: ROAD CONSTRUCTION MATERIAL
HPCL-IF-0012.description: Bitumen is obtained as the last residue in fractional distillation of crude petroleum. It is defined as a viscous liquid, or a solid, consisting essentially of complex mixture of hydrocarbons including high-molecular-weight compounds, such as asphaltenes, and lighter fractions, such as aromatics and saturates. It is substantially non-volatile and softens gradually when heated. It is black or brown in colour & possesses waterproofing and adhesive properties.
HPCL-IF-0012.appData: Paving bitumen is extensively used in the construction of roads, highways and airport tarmac.

HPCL-IF-0013.title: Jute Batching Oil
HPCL-IF-0013.subTitle: Wash Oil
HPCL-IF-0013.description: JBO is a mineral oil fraction, generally mixed with water and emulsifiers. This is traditionally mineral based modern ecofriendly versions.  JBs applied to raw jute fibers to soften them and give cohesion during processing.
HPCL-IF-0013.appData: JBO softens raw jute fibers for easier processing by adding flexibility and cohesion reducig breakage. It also used in steel plant to recover aromatics from oven gas.

HPCL-IF-0014.subTitle: PP Homopolymer Injection moulding
HPCL-IF-0014.description: Polypropylene grade for manufacturing of injection moulded articles

Tensile Stress at Yield (23 °C, 50 mm/min), MPa

HPCL-LPG-0001.title: BUTANE
HPCL-LPG-0001.subTitle: LPG – Commercial / Industrial Fuel
HPCL-LPG-0001.description: Butane (C₄H₁₀) is a clean-burning, liquefiable hydrocarbon gas primarily used as a fuel and blending component in LPG. It is colourless and odourless in its natural form; an odorant such as Ethyl Mercaptan is added for leak detection and safety. Butane has a lower vapour pressure compared to Propane and delivers a high calorific value, making it suitable for commercial and industrial applications under moderate ambient conditions.
HPCL-LPG-0001.appData: Aerosol propellants, portable fuel cartridges for camping stoves and laboratory burners, specialty commercial kitchens operating at controlled indoor temperatures, laboratory and R&D applications, lighter fuel and specialty fuel cylinders.
HPCL-LPG-0001.industrial: Manufacturing & Processing Industries; Aerosol & Chemical Industries; Refrigerant and Specialty Gas Applications

HPCL-LPG-0002.title: PROPANE
HPCL-LPG-0002.subTitle: LPG – Commercial / Industrial Fuel
HPCL-LPG-0002.description: Propane (C₃H₈) is a highly volatile, clean-burning liquefied petroleum hydrocarbon gas used as an industrial and commercial fuel. It is colourless, odourless, and non-toxic in its natural state; an odorant such as Ethyl Mercaptan is added to facilitate leak detection and enhance operational safety. Propane has high vapour pressure and a low boiling point, ensuring reliable vaporisation even at low ambient temperatures, making it suitable for high-demand and cold-weather operations.
HPCL-LPG-0002.appData: Industrial heating & furnaces, LPG-based gensets, metal cutting/brazing/welding, vaporizers & process heating, cold-climate fuel applications.

HPCL-LPG-0003.title: HP GAS
HPCL-LPG-0003.subTitle: Domestic / Commercial / Industrial Fuel/Free trade LPG
HPCL-LPG-0003.description: HP GAS (LPG) is a clean, efficient, and high-calorific gaseous fuel comprising mainly of mixture of  Propane (C₃H₈) and Butane (C₄H₁₀) . It is colourless, odourless in natural form (odorized with Ethyl Mercaptan for safety), non-toxic. HP GAS is produced during petroleum refining and gas processing

specifications.value: Propane / Butane mixture as per IS 4576

specifications.property: C5 Hydrocarbons and Heavier (% of vol)

HPCL-LPG-0003.appData: Cooking fuel (domestic & commercial)    Industrial heating, drying & processing            Metal cutting & brazing                                              Fuel for LPG-based gensets, vaporizers & furnaces

HPCL-LPG-0004.title: HP GAS FLAME PLUS
HPCL-LPG-0004.subTitle: Commercial
HPCL-LPG-0004.description: HP GAS FLAME PLUS is LPG fortified with an additive to enhance the combustion properties of LPG. The additive increases the flame temperature and also improves the combustion kinetics of propane/butane and flame properties, thereby resulting in quicker heating, reduced gas consumption, reduced process time and hence more savings for the customers.
HPCL-LPG-0004.industrial: hospitality (hotels, restaurants, canteens), bakeries, food processing, and various industries etc

HPCL-LPG-0005.title: LPG Industrial Speciality
HPCL-LPG-0005.subTitle: Neat Cutting Fluid
HPCL-LPG-0005.description: Compounded low viscosity neat cutting oil specially designed for the bearing industry, providing excellent lubrication and guaranteeing superior surface finish during machining operations.
HPCL-LPG-0005.appData: Bearing industry machining operations, neat cutting applications, precision metal cutting and finishing processes requiring superior surface finish.

HPCL-LBS-0001.title: HP KISAN SHAKTI
HPCL-LBS-0001.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0001.description: HP KISAN SHAKTI is an engine oil developed for agricultural Pump-Sets running on Diesel, Kerosene or Light Diesel Oil (LDO). The product is made from paraffinic base stocks and fortified with select additives to deliver performance benefits in the pump-sets used in agriculture and farming activities. The superior additive chemistry not only ensures greater protection of the engine against wear and rust, its balanced detergency helps to keep the engine clean and trouble free for longer service intervals.
HPCL-LBS-0001.appData:
HP KISAN SHAKTI is recommended for all types of agricultural and farm equipment like Pumpsets, Tractors, Powertillers, Harvesters & DG sets requiring good quality Diesel Engine Oils.

HP KISAN SHAKTI can also be used in petrol engines to render satisfactory performance.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0002.title: HP KISAN SHAKTI UTTO
HPCL-LBS-0002.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0002.description: HP KISAN SHAKTI UTTO is a premium quality Universal Tractor Transmission Oil (UTTO) formulated from high quality hydrotreated base stocks and carefully selected additives, designed to deliver the best performance in transmission, hydraulic, final drive and PTO systems of modern tractors.
HPCL-LBS-0002.appData: HP KISAN SHAKTI UTTO is recommended for use in tractors manufactured by all major OEMs like Mahindra & Mahindra, Tafe, Eicher, SAME, ITL, Swaraj, Escorts, John Deere, CNH etc. The product can also be used in other off-road/construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluid.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0003.title: HP KISAN TRACTOR OIL 20W-40
HPCL-LBS-0003.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0003.description: HP KISAN TRACTOR OIL 20W-40 grade is a good quality engine oil specifically designed to address the operational severity of Indian tractors in field usage. The product is made from the paraffinic base stocks and fortified with selected additives to deliver satisfactory performance in earlier models of tractors. The product is particularly suitable for the older diesel engines requiring lower detergency.
HPCL-LBS-0003.appData: HP KISAN TRACTOR OIL 20W-40 grade is recommended for earlier models of tractors of all makes, agricultural and farm equipment.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0004.title: HP PUMPSET OIL
HPCL-LBS-0004.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0004.description: HP PUMPSET OIL is a good quality engine oil specially designed for agricultural pump set diesel engines. It meets API CF /SF.
HPCL-LBS-0004.appData: HP PUMPSET OIL is a good quality engine oil specially designed for agricultural pump set diesel engines. It meets API CF /SF.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0005.title: HP SUPERTRAN
HPCL-LBS-0005.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0005.description: HP SUPERTRAN grades are premium quality Universal Tractor Transmission Oils (UTTO) formulated from high quality hydro-treated base stocks and carefully selected additives, designed to deliver the best performance in Transmission, Hydraulic, Final Drive and PTO systems of modern tractors.
HPCL-LBS-0005.appData: HP SUPERTRAN grades are recommended for use in tractors manufactured by all major OEMs like Mahindra & Mahindra, TAFE, Eicher, SAME, Swaraj, Escorts, John Deere, ITL, CNH, etc. The product can also be used in other off-road / construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluid.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0006.title: HP SUPERTRAN HVI
HPCL-LBS-0006.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0006.description: HP SUPERTRAN HVI is a super-premium quality Universal Tractor Transmission Oils (UTTO) formulated from high quality hydrotreated base stocks and carefully selected additives, designed to deliver the best performance in Transmission, Hydraulic, Final Drive and PTO systems of modern tractors.
HPCL-LBS-0006.appData: HP SUPERTRAN HVI grade is recommended for use in tractors manufactured by all major OEMs like Mahindra & Mahindra, Tafe, Eicher, SAME, Swaraj, Escorts, John Deere, ITL, CNH, etc. The product can also be used in other off-road/construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluid.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0007.title: HP TRACTOR OIL 15W-40
HPCL-LBS-0007.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0007.description: HP TRACTOR OIL 15W 40 grade is a premium quality tractor engine oil made from the finest paraffinic base stocks and state of art additive technology, specifically designed to address the operational severity of Indian tractors in field usage. HP TRACTOR OIL 15W 40 provides unmatched soot handling properties, optimum protection for control of corrosive wear, low and high temperature stability, piston deposit control, valve train wear, oxidative thickening, foaming and viscosity loss due to shear.
HPCL-LBS-0007.appData: HP TRACTOR OIL 15W 40 grade is recommended for modern emission compliant TREM IIIA engines of tractors manufactured by John Deere, M&M, Escorts, ITL (Sonalika), New Holland, HMT, TAFE etc. Older tractors (made on TREM II/III Technology etc.) would also derive performance benefits from this product. The oil can also be used in construction equipment & DG sets.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0008.title: HP WET BRAKE OIL
HPCL-LBS-0008.subTitle: Agriculture Oils
HPCL-LBS-0008.description: HP WET BRAKE OIL is a Universal Tractor Transmission Oil (UTTO) formulated from high quality base stocks and carefully selected additives, designed to deliver superior performance in transmission, hydraulic, final drive and PTO systems of tractors.
HPCL-LBS-0008.appData: HP WET BRAKE OIL is recommended for all tractors including Eicher, Escorts, Mahindra & Mahindra, SAME, Swaraj, Sonalika, TAFE etc. The product can also be used in other off-road/construction equipment requiring UTTO type transmission fluid.
packaging: Available in multiple pack sizes, from small retail packs to bulk supply.

HPCL-LBS-0010.title: HYCOM C 100, 150, 220, 320, 460
HPCL-LBS-0010.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0010.description: HYCOM C grades are recommended for cylinder lubrication of single and multistage air compressors with moist air and provide excellent lubrication of piston rings, valves, cylinder liners etc. HYCOM C 460 has low sulphur content for applications in ammonia synthesis compressors in fertiliser plants.

HPCL-LBS-0011.title: HYCOM LS EXPO SERIES
HPCL-LBS-0011.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0011.description: HYCOM LS grades are ultra low sulphur high viscosity oils which can be used in syn gas/ LDPE compressors of make like Cooper Bessemer, Nuovo Pignone etc. The product will is compatible with syn gas operation at high pressure and there will be minimum risk of oxidation. The risk of catalyst poisoning is eliminated as the product has a very low sulphur content. (< 5 ppm )

HPCL-LBS-0012.title: HYCOM LS SERIES
HPCL-LBS-0012.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0012.description: HYCOM LS grades are low sulphur high viscosity oils which can be used in syn gas compressors of make like Cooper Bessemer, Nuovo Pignone etc. The product will is compatible with syn gas operation at high pressure and there will be minimum risk of oxidation. The risk of catalyst poisoning is eliminated as the product has a very low sulphur content. (<0.25% wt)

HPCL-LBS-0013.title: HYCOM PGE
HPCL-LBS-0013.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0013.description: HYCOM PGE Air compressor lubricants have been specially designed for use in rotary screw air compressors. HYCOM PGE compressor lubricants are a fully formulated, fully synthetic blend of polyalkylene glycol (PAG) and polyol ester and thus, take advantage of the excellent performance attributes of both classes of compound. In addition, due to the inherently high viscosity index of HYCOM PGE lubricants, no additional VI improvers are required in the formulation and so the products remain stable to shear forces and do not suffer any irreversible effects.

HPCL-LBS-0014.title: HYCOM Syn 150
HPCL-LBS-0014.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0014.description: HYCOM SYN series are synthetic compressor oils made from High Performance PAO type base stocks which are further enhanced with state of the art additive systems which ensure improved oxidation performance and long term solubility. These oils can be used for high pressure & high performance screw compressor, rotary compressor where improved performance against oxidation and enhanced cleanliness is needed.

HPCL-LBS-0015.title: HYCOM SYN PE SERIES
HPCL-LBS-0015.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0015.description: Available in ISO 46, 68 and 100 viscosity grades, HYCOM SYN PE fluids are formulated from synthetic Polyol Ester fluids combined with the latest additive technology. They can be used in all compressors where discharge temperatures exceed 200 deg C

HPCL-LBS-0016.title: HYCOM Turbo SYN
HPCL-LBS-0016.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0016.description: HYCOM TURBO SYN fluids are formulated from synthetic hydrocarbon fluids (PAO’s) combined with the latest additive technology

HPCL-LBS-0017.title: HYCOM TURBO SYN 10 / 15 SEALS OILS
HPCL-LBS-0017.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0017.description: HYCOM TURBO SYN 10 and 15 are synthetic seal oil for mechanical seal systems. HYCOM TURBO SYN 10 and 15 is made from advanced Group IV synthetic base stocks. The synthetic base stock is FDA Compliant.

HPCL-LBS-0018.title: HYCOM VDL T 32, 46, 68, 100, 150, 220, 320
HPCL-LBS-0018.subTitle: COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0018.description: it is most suitable to be used in high performance rotary air compressors/screw compressors and vacuum pump. This can be used upto 250°C air discharge temperature. It can be used in journal bearing and antifriction bearings for fans operating at high speed and temperatures. HYCOM VDL T100 is an ashless fluid which can be used in the high pressure boiler control valves.

HPCL-LBS-0019.title: CYNDOL GRADES
HPCL-LBS-0019.subTitle: Cylinder oil
HPCL-LBS-0019.description: CYNDOL grades are eminently suitable for cylinder lubrication of steam engines using highly super heated steam. They grades are also widely used in large slow moving industrial gears and plain bearings. The TC grades are recommended for steam engines operating under wet saturated steam conditions. These are also used in calender bearings and sugar mill roller bearings.
HPCL-LBS-0019.appData: CYNDOL grades are eminently suitable for cylinder lubrication of steam engines using highly super heated steam. They grades are also widely used in large slow moving industrial gears and plain bearings. The TC grades are recommended for steam engines operating under wet saturated steam conditions. These are also used in calender bearings and sugar mill roller bearings. They are especially suitable for the lubrication of worm gears. CYNDOL 1000 and 1500 are also used as tempering and wire drawing applications with satisfactory results.

HPCL-LBS-0020.title: HP FILM OIL
HPCL-LBS-0020.subTitle: Film Oil
HPCL-LBS-0020.description: HP FILM OIL grades are recommended for use in anti-friction bearings, plain bearings, drive gears and pinion of steel mills, where operating conditions are moderate. They are also suitable for use in circulation systems, where oils with high demulsibility characteristics are required.
HPCL-LBS-0020.appData: HP FILM OIL grades meet IPSS 1-09-001-95 GRADE 1 TO 6 & IS : 6552-198HP FILM OIL grades are recommended for use in anti-friction bearings, plain bearings, drive gears and pinion of steel mills, where operating conditions are moderate. They are also suitable for use in circulation systems, where oils with high demulsibility characteristics are required.

HPCL-LBS-0021.title: HP Steel 320
HPCL-LBS-0021.subTitle: Film Oil

Morgan Bearings are used in the Plate Mill, Wire Rod Mill, Merchant Mill, Blooming and Billet Mill, and Rail & Structural Mill. The oils are also recommended for those places where the bearings are under heavy load and in the presence of water.

HPCL-LBS-0022.title: HP STEEL EP 100
HPCL-LBS-0022.subTitle: Film Oil
HPCL-LBS-0022.description: HP STEEL EP 100 is a specially formulated premium bearing and hydraulic oil to meet the specific requirements in steel plants. It meets extreme pressure and good demulsibility requirements in bearing lubrication.
HPCL-LBS-0022.appData: This oil has very good and demulsibility characteristics and hence it is recommended for use in all Morgoil bearings in no-twist rod mills in Steel Plants. It is also recommended in applications where severe load conditions are encountered.

HPCL-LBS-0023.title: HP STEEL GRADES
HPCL-LBS-0023.subTitle: Film Oil
HPCL-LBS-0023.description: HP STEEL Grades are premium quality heavy duty bearing and circulating oil. They have high viscosity index with superior oxidation and thermal stability. They meet the requirement of high demulsibility, low foaming, excellent rust protection and good film strength property to minimise wear in roll-neck bearings of steel mills.
HPCL-LBS-0023.appData: These oils are suitable for use in the Morgan Bearings of Steel Mills. Morgan Bearings are used in the Plate Mill, Wire Rod Mill, Merchant Mill, Blooming and Billet Mill, and Rail & Structural Mill. The various viscometrix of HP STEEL Grades are available for these mills. The oils are also recommended for those places where the bearings are under heavy load & in the presence of water.

HPCL-LBS-0024.title: HP FLUSHING OIL
HPCL-LBS-0024.subTitle: GENERAL PURPOSE MACHINERY OILS
HPCL-LBS-0024.description: HP Flushing oil is an oil for removing of contaminants from a machine lubrication system. It has a low viscosity, which enables good flushing operation.

HPCL-LBS-0025.title: YANTROL / YANTROL N SERIES
HPCL-LBS-0025.subTitle: GENERAL PURPOSE MACHINERY OILS
HPCL-LBS-0025.description: YANTROL grades are high quality lubricating oils intended for general lubrication of industrial machinery. They are manufactured from selected base stocks and fortified with additives like antiwear and antirust. They are specially developed for steel mill general purpose lubrication.
HPCL-LBS-0025.appData: YANTROL grades are general purpose lubricants for ‘once through’ application situation in textile mills, paper mills and machine tools. The grades are used in steel mills.

HPCL-LBS-0026.title: ENKLO 32 SUPER
HPCL-LBS-0026.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0026.description: ENKLO 32 Super is a hydraulic fluid formulated to give a near transparent appearance and composed from hydro treated base stocks. The hydraulic oil has good antiwear additive system Meets IS:10522 Standard for antiwear hydraulic fluid.

HPCL-LBS-0027.title: ENKLO 46 PREMIUM
HPCL-LBS-0027.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0027.description: ENKLO 46 PREMIUM is blended from deep hydrofinished base stocks and select additives. The additives are designed for optimum compressor operation. The additives are used to enhance the oxidation stability, anti-rust characteristics, anti-wear properties of the oil. The oil has natural demulsification property, low foaming tendency and quick air release property.

HPCL-LBS-0028.title: ENKLO 46 SUPER
HPCL-LBS-0028.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0028.description: ENKLO 46 Super is a hydraulic fluid formulated to give a near transparent appearance and composed from hydro treated base stocks. The hydraulic oil has good antiwear additive system Meets IS:10522 Standard for antiwear hydraulic fluid.

HPCL-LBS-0029.title: ENKLO 68 PREMIUM
HPCL-LBS-0029.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS

The oil has natural demulsification property, low foaming tendency and quick air release property

HPCL-LBS-0030.title: ENKLO FRPS 46

HPCL-LBS-0031.title: ENKLO FRWG
HPCL-LBS-0031.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0031.description: ENKLO FRWG is a hydraulic oil formulated from glycols for meeting the fire resistant requirements in fire prone areas in Steel, Mining, Die-Casting and Plastics industries. It is a true solution of glycols and water. This grade is composed of Polyalkylene Glycols, selected additives for wear reduction, corrosion inhibitors, anti-oxidants, anti-foamants and water. The operating temperature of the oil ranges from -20°C to +60°C. This oil is suitable for use in all low temperature applications without any chance of freezing and gelling. This oil meets IS: 10532 (part–3) – 1993 and HF-C classification of European Mines Safety Commission.
HPCL-LBS-0031.appData: This oil is suitable for use in the hydraulic systems of coke oven battery carrier, crane hydraulics in high temperature regions of Steel Plants. It is used in control governors in steam turbines, control valves in presence of superheated steam in Power Plants. It is also suitable for use in hydrostatic systems in Plastics and Die-Casting industries.

HPCL-LBS-0032.title: ENKLO Grades
HPCL-LBS-0032.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0032.description: ENKLO grades designed for use in circulating systems are made from high viscosity index,chemically stable base stocks which are further fortified with antioxidants, anticorrosion, antiwear and antifoam additives. They meet the requirements of very high pressure systems and also of systems where high pump speeds are encountered.
HPCL-LBS-0032.appData: ENKLO grades are suitable for use in circulating system, hydraulic system, enclosed gear boxes,chain drives, compressors, vacuum pumps, mining machinery, machine tools, etc.

HPCL-LBS-0033.title: ENKLO HLP
HPCL-LBS-0033.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS

specifications.property: FZG Load Test, Passes Load Stage

Specially recommended for sophisticated high performance electro-hydraulic or numerically controlled systems.

HPCL-LBS-0034.title: ENKLO HLP T
HPCL-LBS-0034.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0034.description: ENKLO HLP T grades are premium quality lubricating oils formulated with turbine quality hydroprocessed base stock and carefully selected additives. ENKLO HL T grades offer outstanding anti-wear properties, excellent oxidation stability and a high FZG rating.
HPCL-LBS-0034.appData: Used in hydraulic systems, enclosed gear boxes, chain drives, compressors, vacuum pumps, mining machinery, machine tools, circulating oiling systems etc., wherein oil is recirculated and used for extensive periods. Specially recommended for sophisticated high performance electro-hydraulic or numerically controlled systems

HPCL-LBS-0035.title: ENKLO HLP T AH
HPCL-LBS-0035.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0035.description: ENKLO HLP T AH grades are premium quality lubricating oils formulated with group II base stock and carefully selected additives. ENKLO HLP T AH grades offer outstanding anti-wear properties, excellent oxidation stability and a high FZG rating. The product is zinc free & ash free.
HPCL-LBS-0035.appData: Used in hydraulic systems, enclosed gear boxes, chain drives, compressors, vacuum pumps, mining machinery, machine tools, circulating oiling systems etc., wherein oil is recirculated and used for extensive periods. Specially recommended for sophisticated high performance electro-hydraulic or numerically controlled systems. It is also recommended as a control fluid for certain governor systems where silver/ cadmium coated surfaces calls for fluids which are zinc free. It is also used in hydraulic systems in aluminium processing/ rolling where zinc based hydraulic oils can form surface stains. It is recommended for all applications where strict environment concerns restrict use of products containing zinc & other metals.

HPCL-LBS-0036.title: ENKLO HLP T PLUS
HPCL-LBS-0036.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0036.description: ENKLO HLP T PLUS is a high performance hydraulic fluid based severely hydro treated base stocks. The unique anti wear additive system provides enhanced protection for components as compared to traditional hydraulic oil meeting DIN 51524 Part II (HLP) and Parker Denison HF-0. The additive system is thermally stable and resists hydrolysis in the combined presence of thermal, mechanical and chemical stress.ENKLO HLP T Plus series hydraulic oil has passed the demanding Bosch Rexroth RFT-APU-CL Closed Loop Axial Pump test. The test pump operation includes certain periods where pressure exceeds 500 bar with temperatures touching peak of 100 degrees C . The total duration of testing is 510 hours.ENKLO HLP T Plus series also exceeds the requirement of DENISON HF-0 and has comfortably passed the Parker Denison Hybrid Pump test plus the EATON Vickers 35VQ25 Pump test. The product has excellent filterability.
HPCL-LBS-0036.appData: ENKLO HLP T PLUS carries the formal approval and listing from Bosch Rexroth and Fives Cincinnati Lab (earlier known as Cincinnati Milacron). By virtue of these approvals ENKLO HLP T PLUS grades can be used in hydraulic system of plastic injection molding machines, hydraulic systems in steel, mobile equipment & engineering industries where the latest pumps of Bosch Rexroth are in use.

HPCL-LBS-0037.title: ENKLO HVI PLUS 32
HPCL-LBS-0037.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0037.description: ENKLO HVI PLUS 32 is a ultra-high performance hydraulic fluid formulated with severely hydro treated base stocks. The unique zinc free and ash free anti wear additive system provides enhanced protection for components as compared to traditional hydraulic oil meeting DIN 51524 Part III (HVLP) and Parker Denison HF-0. The additive system is thermally stable and resists hydrolysis in the combined presence of thermal, mechanical and chemical stress. The product has very high shear stable viscosity index, which allows outstanding low-temperature properties. Demulsifying additives and is designed for excellent compatibility with nonferrous metals and a high wear protection. Fulfils the requirements according to DIN 51524-3: HVLP and ISO 6743-4: HV.

HPCL-LBS-0038.title: ENKLO HVLP AH SERIES
HPCL-LBS-0038.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0038.description: ENKLO HVLP AH grades are premium quality lubricating oils formulated with high quality base stock and carefully selected additives. ENKLO HVLP AH grades offer outstanding high viscosity index, anti-wear properties, excellent oxidation stability and a high FZG rating.the product is zinc free and ashless. The use of Enklo HVLP AH fluids results in improved energy efficiency.

HPCL-LBS-0039.title: ENKLO HVLP EE
HPCL-LBS-0039.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0039.description: ENKLO HVLP EE GRADES ARE PREMIUM QUALITY LUBRICATING OILS FORMULATED WITH HIGH QUALITY XHVI BASE STOCK AND CAREFULLY SELECTED ADDITIVES. ENKLO HVLP EE GRADES OFFER VERY-VERY HIGH VISCOSITY INDEX, ANTI-WEAR PROPERTIES, EXCELLENT OXIDATION STABILITY AND A HIGH FZG RATING.

HPCL-LBS-0041.title: ENKLO SYNTHETIC
HPCL-LBS-0041.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0041.description: ENKLO SYNTHETIC is top of the line premium quality hydraulic oil made from synthetic Base Stocks and ash less additives. This ensures excellent anti – oxidation properties and at the same time low varnish and sludge. This oil offers a longer drain period of 5000 hours with improved energy efficiency & equipment durability during use.

HPCL-LBS-0042.title: HP BRAKE FLUID 15 CM
HPCL-LBS-0042.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0042.description: It is Low viscosity Brake fluid for applications in Construction Machinery. Approved by Brakes India Ltd.
HPCL-LBS-0042.appData: Recommended for use in brakes master cylinder application of Construction equipment only.

HPCL-LBS-0043.title: HYMAROL HLP T
HPCL-LBS-0043.subTitle: HYDRAULIC OILS
HPCL-LBS-0043.description: HYMAROL grades are premium quality lubricating oils formulated with high quality base stock and carefully selected additives. HYMAROL HLP grades offer outstanding high viscosity index, anti-wear properties, excellent oxidation stability and a high FZG Rating.
HPCL-LBS-0043.appData: Used in mobile hydraulics requiring high viscosity index (HVI FLUIDS), Hydraulic Systems, Mining Machinery, Machine tools systems etc., wherein oil is recirculated and used for extensive periods.

HPCL-LBS-0044.title: WAYLUBE
HPCL-LBS-0044.subTitle: MACHINERY OILS
HPCL-LBS-0044.description: WAYLUBE grades have been formulated to impart special frictional characteristics that overcome the stickslip motion, ordinarily associated with slow moving machine parts. They are also fortified with mild extreme pressure and rust preventive properties.It is a combined hydraulic and machine toolway lubricant possessing adequate lubricity to eliminate stickslip and chatter under moderate load condition and at the same time serves as hydraulic media in noncritical systems.
HPCL-LBS-0044.appData: WAYLUBE 68, 220 are recommended for slideway lubrication of planers, grinders, horizontal boring machines, shapers, jig borers etc, involving high precision work and are also recommended for lubrication of gears by oil can. WAYLUBE 68 is recommended for machine tools combined hydraulic and way lubrication systems. They meet CINCINNATI MILACRON thermal stability test P 47.

HPCL-LBS-0045.title: HYTAK
HPCL-LBS-0045.subTitle: OPEN GEAR LUBRICANTS
HPCL-LBS-0045.description: HYTAK series of lubricants are heavy, viscous, black petroleum products for the lubrication of open gears, chains and wire ropes. They all have a pronounced stringiness and excellent film strength to withstand high pressures encountered at the meshing tooth surfaces of heavily loaded open gears. They also possess good rust preventive properties and have ability to stay in place and provide long-lasting protection to wire ropes and open gears.
HPCL-LBS-0045.appData: HYTAK grades are recommended for the lubrication of conventional open gears, cables and wire-ropes. The heavier grades require heating before application and in liquid state they can be applied with swab, brush, paddle or spray. The extra tackiness of these grades helps them to stay in place and provide unusually longlasting protection to gear and wire-rope surfaces. As a result, the interval between applications of lubricant can be increased when HYTAK grades are employed. HYTAK F 4 and F 5 contain a non-flammable solvent for easy application without heating. After the application, the solvent evaporates leaving behind a tacky film that will neither be squeezed aside by the meshing action of teeth nor thrown off by centrifugal force. Additionally, extreme and tackiness additives are incorporated in these products to impart extreme-pressure lubricating properties and improve their rust-preventing characteristics.

HPCL-LBS-0046.title: HYTAK 500 NB
HPCL-LBS-0046.subTitle: OPEN GEAR LUBRICANTS
HPCL-LBS-0046.description: HYTAK 500 NB is semi-synthetic type viscous oil. The very high kinematic viscosity results in formation of thicker Elasto Hydrodynamic Lubrication (EHL) Film. The advanced extreme pressure additives package, results in reduction of temperature; thereby improving system efficiency. HYTAK 500 NB product is clear, and free from solids, heavy metals, diluents like chlorinated solvents or any toxic compound. The product is free from harmful Polycyclic Aromatic Compounds (DMSO Extractables < 3% wt). HYTAK 500 NB is recommended for open gear drives of ball mills, rotary kilns, rotary barrel mixers and dryers.

HPCL-LBS-0047.title: HYTAK 500 NB-1000
HPCL-LBS-0047.subTitle: OPEN GEAR LUBRICANTS
HPCL-LBS-0047.description: HYTAK 500 NB product is clear, and free from solids, heavy metals, diluents like chlorinated solvents or any toxic compound. It eliminates the black oils with asphaltene and carcinogenic effects and the black greases in the sugar industry. The product is free from harmful Polycyclic Aromatic Compounds (DMSO Extractables < 3% wt). The black oils and black greases used in most mills typically have high content of PCA which is harmful. Compared to the lubrication with Lithium-graphite/Lithium Complex MoS2-Graphite/ Aluminum Soap Graphite greases, it increases the lubrication reliability because it avoids the blockages in the tubing that usually happens by the separation of grease-metallic soap-graphite-MoS2 particles, which is typical of this type of products when they work under pressure by the centralized pump system. HYTAK 500 NB can be applied through immersion, paddle wheel, circulation and spray lubrication of mill bearings and large girth gear drives.

HPCL-LBS-0048.title: NU-MATIC
HPCL-LBS-0048.subTitle: Pneumatic tool oils
HPCL-LBS-0048.description: NU-MATIC is a line of first quality rock drill lubricants formulated for the lubrication of pneumatic tools. They have pronounced extreme-pressure and rust-preventive properties. They contain a tackiness agent to give good adhesive characteristics and an emulsifying agent that helps in forming highly stable emulsions in the presence of water. They are formulated to provide effective protection to metal surfaces against acidic corrosion.
HPCL-LBS-0048.appData: These oils are recommended for lubrication of pneumatic equipment such as rock drills, jack hammers, stoppers, drifters, chippers, wagon drills, tempers & pavement breakers etc. They are also used in small in-plant pneumatic tools like grinders, filing tools, drills, tapers, impact wrenches, rivetters, hoists etc.

HPCL-LBS-0049.title: SEETUL GRADES
HPCL-LBS-0049.subTitle: REFRIGERATION COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0049.description:
SEETUL grades are refrigeration compressor oils.

The grades are formulated from specially selected lube base stocks to provide low pour point, low floc point, dryness, good chemical stability and ready solubility in liquified refrigerants.

They have additional characteristics of low freon floc point.
HPCL-LBS-0049.appData: They are recommended for wide range of refrigeration compressors, both reciprocating as well as rotary, using all conventional refrigerants except sulfur dioxide.

HPCL-LBS-0050.title: SEETUL N 68 (P)
HPCL-LBS-0050.subTitle: REFRIGERATION COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0050.description: SEETUL N 68 (P) grade is refrigeration compressor oil. The grade is formulated from specially selected deep hydro finished lube base stocks to provide low pour point, dryness, good chemical stability.It is recommended for wide range of refrigeration compressors, both reciprocating as well as rotary, using ammonia and carbon dioxide. It is not recommended for R-12, R-22 and other Freon Refrigerants.

HPCL-LBS-0051.title: SEETUL RFL GRADES
HPCL-LBS-0051.subTitle: REFRIGERATION COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0051.description: New polyalkylene glycol based air conditioning/refrigeration lubricants with enhanced, wide temperature compatibility with modern refrigerants

specifications.value: Clear, colourless & liquid	Clear, colourless & liquid	Clear, colourless & liquid

specifications.property: Sealed Tube Stability with R-134a (14 days, 175°C, Al, Cu, Fe metals)
specifications.value: Clear, Colourless fluid. No	Clear, Colourless fluid. No precipitate. All metals shiny	Clear, Colourless fluid. No precipitate. All metals shiny

HPCL-LBS-0052.title: SEETUL S 68
HPCL-LBS-0052.subTitle: REFRIGERATION COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0052.description: HPCL SEETUL S 68 are fully synthetic lubricants, designed for use in refrigeration compressors and heat pumps. They are formulated from polyalphaolefin (PAO) fluids, which have outstanding resistance to thermal/oxidative degradation. Their naturally high shear stable viscosity index and low temperature fluidity, make them perform in severe service conditions that are beyond the capabilities of conventional mineral oils. Their solubility and miscibility with refrigerants is low, resulting in higher film thickness in the presence of refrigerants under pressure and reduced shaft seal leakage. Their stability and low volatility eliminates “light end stripping” which can occur with conventional mineral oils.
HPCL-LBS-0052.appData: They are specifically recommended for the lubrication of refrigeration compressors operating at very high temperatures, and for systems with very low evaporator temperatures. They are suitable for compressor systems using refrigerants such as ammonia, carbon dioxide and HCFCs such as R-22; and CFC R-12. They are compatible with all refrigerants except sulphur dioxide. They are compatible with Mineral oils.

HPCL-LBS-0053.title: SEETUL SE 68
HPCL-LBS-0053.subTitle: REFRIGERATION COMPRESSOR OILS
HPCL-LBS-0053.description: SEETUL SE 68 is a synthetic ester based lubricating oil for compressors running on HFCs like R-134 A. This refrigerant is CFC Free and therefore considered environment friendly. For ensuring proper lubricity we have to use synthetic esters.

HPCL-LBS-0054.title: SPINTEK
HPCL-LBS-0054.subTitle: SPINDLE OILS
HPCL-LBS-0054.description: These oils are recommended for lubrication of textile and machine tools, spindle bearings, timing gears, centrifugal separators, positive displacement blowers and hydraulic systems of certain high precision machine tools.

HPCL-LBS-0055.title: SPINTEK 3
HPCL-LBS-0055.subTitle: SPINDLE OILS
HPCL-LBS-0055.description: SPINTEK grades of oils are premium quality lubricating oils recommended for the lubrication of high speed spindles. They are manufactured from highly refined base oils possessing excellent chemical & oxidation stability. They are further fortified with carefully selected oxidation and rust inhibitors. The rust inhibitor protects bearing surface from rusting and corrosion even in the presence of moisture. A special antiwear additive improves oiliness and reduces friction and wear between the rubbing surfaces to an absolute minimum.
HPCL-LBS-0055.appData: These oils are recommended for lubrication of Textile and Machine Tools, Spindle Bearings, Timing Gears, Centrifugal Separators, Positive Displacement Blowers and Hydraulic Systems of Certain High Precision Machine Tools.

HPCL-LBS-0056.title: SPINTEK EE SERIES
HPCL-LBS-0056.subTitle: SPINDLE OILS
HPCL-LBS-0056.description: SPINTEK EE grades of oils are energy efficient premium quality lubricating oils recommended for the lubrication of high speed spindles. They are manufactured from highly refined base oils possessing excellent chemical & oxidation stability. They are further fortified with carefully selected oxidation and rust inhibitors. The rust inhibitor protects bearing surface from rusting and corrosion even in the presence of moisture. A special antiwear additive improves oiliness and reduces friction and wear between the rubbing surfaces to an absolute minimum.
HPCL-LBS-0056.appData: These oils are recommended for lubrication of textile and machine tools, spindle bearings, timing gears, centrifugal separators, positive displacement blowers and hydraulic systems of certain high precision machine tools. SPINTEK EE 12 grade is approved by atira.

HPCL-LBS-0057.title: SPINTEX SYN 2
HPCL-LBS-0057.subTitle: SPINDLE OILS
HPCL-LBS-0057.description: SPINTEK SYN 2 is a synthetic oil based on Polyalphaolefin (PAO). The product is near water white and has high viscosity Index. The product is food grade and has very low pour point. It is recommended for hydrodynamic lubrication of high speed journals and spindles

HPCL-LBS-0058.title: STANTROL 1,3
HPCL-LBS-0058.subTitle: HIGH TEMPRATURE CHAIN LUBRICANT
HPCL-LBS-0058.description: Synthetic lubricant used in textile and other industry for lubrication of chain drives and stentors. Particularly suitable as high temperature chain lubricant.
HPCL-LBS-0058.appData: Lubrication of chains,chain drives & stentors exposed to high tempertaures upto 200 ºC

HPCL-LBS-0059.title: CRUSHFINE 40 NB
HPCL-LBS-0059.subTitle: HIGH TEMPRATURE CHAIN LUBRICANT
HPCL-LBS-0059.description: To take care of the cleanliness aspect and the environment HPCL has come out with a unique bitumen free lubricant for crushing mills. CRUSHFINE 40 NB from HPCL protects the bearings under high pressures and also the corrosive and washing properties of the cane juice.

HPCL-LBS-0060.title: CRUSHFINE 45 NB-II

HPCL-LBS-0063.description: These oils are Sugar Mills lubricants manufactured from high viscosity lubricating oil base stocks and contain selected non-toxic mild EP and special compounding agents. These oils prevent wear and corrosion of bearings and have excellent resistance to leakage.

HPCL-LBS-0064.title: HP TRANSFORMER OIL I
HPCL-LBS-0064.subTitle: TRANSFORMER OILS
HPCL-LBS-0064.description:
HP TRANSFORMER OIL I is inhibited type transformer oil meeting IS:12463. Inhibited transformer oils can extend the service life of transformer oil.

HPCL-LBS-0066.title: TURBINOL
HPCL-LBS-0066.subTitle: TURBINE OILS

HPCL-LBS-0069.title: TURBINOL XT
HPCL-LBS-0069.subTitle: TURBINE OILS
HPCL-LBS-0069.description: TURBINOL XT grades are premium quality lubricating oils designed to provide efficient and trouble-free service in precision industrial machinery having most exacting lubrication requirements. The excellence of TURBINOL XT grades is the combined result of selected stable base oils, efficient refining methods and effective additives.
HPCL-LBS-0069.appData: Recommended for lubrication of steam, gas & hydraulic turbines & can be used in hydraulic systems requiring very long life lubricant of outstanding properties. Specifically recommended for lubrication of geared turbines.

HPCL-LBS-0070.title: HP Metwire NB
HPCL-LBS-0070.subTitle: WIRE ROPE LUBRICANT
HPCL-LBS-0070.description: HP METWIRE NB is produced from the highest quality petroleum fractions and is a non-bituminous base wire rope lubricant. In addition to having excellent lubricating properties, they contain selected additives to obtain sufficient chemical resistance; water displacing properties; excellent rust prevention, oxidation stability and penetration. The high polarity of both products enables them to creep and “wet” the metal surface forming an adhesive and protective film.
HPCL-LBS-0070.appData: Product can be applied by swabbing, drip lubrication, continuous bath, high pressure auto lubrication. Suitable for lubrication of wire ropes in cranes, draglines, overhead trolleys, pulley mechanisms, lifts.

HPCL-LBS-0071.title: Rodec 120
HPCL-LBS-0071.subTitle: WIRE ROPE LUBRICANT
HPCL-LBS-0071.description:
Wire Rope Lubricants Provides Two Important Functions, Namely :
1. It protects the wire rope from moisture, abrasion and corrosive elements
2. It provides for internal lubrication of the strands so as to prevent fatigue failure.
Wire Rope Lubricants Are Of Two Types Bitumen Based And Non Bitumen Based.

HPCL-LBS-0072.title: HP DRAWMET 15, 15S
HPCL-LBS-0072.subTitle: METAL DRAWING COMPOUNDS
HPCL-LBS-0072.description:
A very important segment of the metal working industry is metal forming, in this process the metal instead of being cut or machined, is forced to flow to acquire the desired dimensions by the use of the suitable mechanical equipment. Metal forming process includes operations like pressing, stamping, deep drawing, wire drawing, and tube drawing and forging. During these operations considerable amount of heat and stress and developed. Our DRAWMET grades are tailor made to satisfy the various requirements included in metal drawing/forging operations.

HP DRAWMET 15, 15S are wire drawing oil fortified with high performance wetting agents. This oil is specially suited for deep drawing of aluminum.
HPCL-LBS-0072.appData: The product has been specially developed for aluminum wire drawing applications. This product ensures nil wire breakage and scouring. DRAWMET 15 S is recommended for high speed drawing and can be used in the gear box of drawing equipment.

HPCL-LBS-0073.title: HP DRAWMET 22
HPCL-LBS-0073.subTitle: METAL DRAWING COMPOUNDS
HPCL-LBS-0073.description: General purpose compound used for wire/tube drawing of carbon steels and difficult nonferrous alloys. The cream coloured paste consists of inert fillers to impart the requisite film strength.
HPCL-LBS-0073.appData: Suitable for use as a coolant in wire / tube drawing of steel and other difficult nonferrous draws. This product is also suitable for use in pressing operations.

HPCL-LBS-0074.title: HP DRAWMET 44
HPCL-LBS-0074.subTitle: METAL DRAWING COMPOUNDS
HPCL-LBS-0074.description: Non staining, water-soluble cream coloured paste for “dry on” or emulsion application. It is manufactured with specially balanced mixture of soap and fat. The recommended dilution ratio with water is between i to 5 percent depending upon the gauge of wire to be drawn.

specifications.property: Copper Strip Corrosion At R.T.ON 10 % Solution 12 Hrs

HPCL-LBS-0074.appData: The product can be used for deep drawing of wires, tube drawing, forming, spinning and other similar medium to heavy duty operations of carbon steels and nonferrous metals.

HPCL-LBS-0075.title: HP DRAWMET 66
HPCL-LBS-0075.subTitle: METAL DRAWING COMPOUNDS
HPCL-LBS-0075.description: Lubricant specially developed for operations like die forging with marked ability to withstand high temperatures due to fortification with special additives.

specifications.property: Copper Strip Corrosion At R.T.ON 10% Solution 12 Hrs Max

HPCL-LBS-0075.appData: The product can be used for deep drawing of wires, tube drawing, forming, spinning and other similar medium to heavy duty operations of carbon steels and nonferrous metals.

HPCL-LBS-0076.title: HP DRAWMET 81 CF
HPCL-LBS-0076.subTitle: METAL DRAWING COMPOUNDS
HPCL-LBS-0076.description:
This is a semi synthetic chlorine free product can be used for boiler tube pipe bending operation. Can also be used for pilgering operation. It can withstand filtration, centrifuging, etc.

It has been tried out at ABB-ABL Durgapur and has given good results.

HPCL-LBS-0077.title: HP KOOLKUT 40
HPCL-LBS-0077.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS
HPCL-LBS-0077.description: This is general-purpose emulsifiable oil and forms milky white emulsion
HPCL-LBS-0077.appData: Suitable for all metals for machining operations where emulsifiable oil are normally used. The recommended concentration is between 5 to 10 % depending on the severity of machining. Sometimes used successfully for even grinding operations.

HPCL-LBS-0078.title: HP KOOLKUT 40 M
HPCL-LBS-0078.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS

HPCL-LBS-0078.appData: KOOLKUT 40 M is suitable for all metals for machining operations where emulsifiable oil are normally recommended. The recommended concentration is between 2 to 10 % depending on the severity of machining. Used successfully for many grinding operations also. The product specifically gives excellent results during machining Operations on yellow metals without leaving stains and giving adequate stain protection during intermediate storage.

HPCL-LBS-0079.title: HP KOOLKUT 60
HPCL-LBS-0079.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS
HPCL-LBS-0079.description: General purpose emulsifiable cutting oil forming a translucent emulsion. The ultra-fine dispersion of the oil globules reduces grinding wheel clogging and low oil content emulsion may be used safely without loss of non-corrosive properties.
HPCL-LBS-0079.appData: Suitable for all metals for machining operations where emulsifiable oils are normally used. The recommended concentration is between 5 to 10 % depending on the severity of machining. Particularly useful for all applications where sight of the work place is important.

HPCL-LBS-0080.title: HP KOOLKUT 70
HPCL-LBS-0080.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS

HPCL-LBS-0080.appData: Rust preventive type of coolant specifically designed for grinding and high speed machining. Recommended dilution ratio with water is 2-4 %.

HPCL-LBS-0081.title: HP KOOLKUT 80
HPCL-LBS-0081.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS
HPCL-LBS-0081.description: Superior emulsifiable cutting oil forming a white milky emulsion having longer life. The product forms biostable emulsions facilitating easier handling and disposal.

specifications.value: 400 PPM Hard Water 5:1 and 20:1 Ratio	PASSES

HPCL-LBS-0081.appData: Suitable for all metals for machining operations where emulsifiable oils are normally used. The recommended concentration is between 3 to 5% depending on the severity of machining. Product can be used successfully even for grinding operations.

HPCL-LBS-0082.title: HP KOOLKUT EP 66
HPCL-LBS-0082.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS

It is more effective than ordinary emulsifiable oils in extending tool life. Recommended concentration is 5 to 10 % depending on the severity of machining.

HPCL-LBS-0083.title: HP KOOLKUT EP 67

HPCL-LBS-0084.title: HP KOOLKUT EP 68

HPCL-LBS-0085.title: HP KOOLKUT EP 681
HPCL-LBS-0085.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS
HPCL-LBS-0085.description: KOOLKUT EP 681 is a water miscible mineral oil based premium metal cutting fluid containing balanced proportions of Chlorinated EP agents and suitable Esters for imparting superior Lubricity. The product forms a milky white to translucent emulsion.

specifications.property: Cast Iron corrosion Test as per IS 1115

KOOLKUT EP 681 is a heavy duty Steel & Aluminum machining fluid for use on Ferrous & Non-Ferrous metals in wide range of applications like Machining, Turning, Tapping, Drilling, Milling, Grooving etc. It is more effective than ordinary emulsifiable oils in extending tool life. HPCL-LBS-0086.title: HP SYNTHKOOL 24121
HPCL-LBS-0086.subTitle: SOLUBLE CUTTING FLUIDS
HPCL-LBS-0086.description: HP SYNTHKOOL 24121 is a low mineral oil containing, water miscible semi synthetic type cutting fluid blended with high performing lubricity additives. HPCL-LBS-0087.title: HP TRIMOFIN 12

It is a high performance cutting and neat grinding oil based on specially selected, thermally stable base oils. TRIMOFIN 12 provides a consistent level of grinding performance as well as guaranteeing excellent lubrication and cooling. It gives good grinding performance with control on stray mist.

HPCL-LBS-0096.title: HP TRIMOFIN 27

HPCL-LBS-0096.description: Non staining EP type straight cutting oil containing chlorine and inactive sulphur fortified with oiliness additives.

HPCL-LBS-0097.title: HP TRIMOFIN 54
HPCL-LBS-0097.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids
HPCL-LBS-0097.description: Staining EP type straight cutting oil containing active and inactive Sulphur fortified with oiliness additives.

HPCL-LBS-0098.title: HP TRIMOFIN 55
HPCL-LBS-0098.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids
HPCL-LBS-0098.description: Staining EP type straight cutting oil containing active sulphur and chlorine fortified with oiliness additives possessing medium viscosity.
HPCL-LBS-0098.appData: Medium viscosity oil specially developed for heavy duty applications like gear hobbing, thread cutting etc. The oil is also suitable for all machining operations on high tensile steels and for less severe operations on stainless and shear resistant alloys

HPCL-LBS-0099.title: HP TRIMOFIN 56

HPCL-LBS-0100.title: HP TRIMOFIN 58

HPCL-LBS-0101.title: HP TRIMOFIN 58 BR

HPCL-LBS-0103.title: HP TRIMOL 225

HPCL-LBS-0104.title: KOOLKUT 40 MS
HPCL-LBS-0104.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids

HPCL-LBS-0105.title: KOOLKUT EP 68
HPCL-LBS-0105.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids

KOOLKUT EP 68 is suitable for heavy duty machining of cast iron, steel and aluminum alloys. It is more effective than ordinary emulsifiable oils in extending tool life.

Suitable for all metals for machining operations where emulsifiable oils are normally used. The recommended concentration is between 3 to 5% depending on the severity of machining. Product can be used successfully even for grinding operations.

HPCL-LBS-0106.title: SYNTHKOOL 100, 101, 102
HPCL-LBS-0106.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids
HPCL-LBS-0106.description: Semi-synthetic cutting fluid consisting of carefully selected rust preventive additives and other performance improvers, supplied in solution form. SYNTHAKOOL 100 & 102 is totally synthetic.
HPCL-LBS-0106.appData: Recommended concentration in the ratio of 2-4% in water. The resultant solution provides exceptional anti-rust & cooling properties when used in grinding and other high speed machining operations. It is highly resistant to bacterial attack and provides long life in use.

HPCL-LBS-0107.title: HP TRIMOFIN 19
HPCL-LBS-0107.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids

HPCL-LBS-0108.title: TRIMOFIN 64, 65, 66
HPCL-LBS-0108.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids

HPCL-LBS-0109.title: TRIMOFIN AL
HPCL-LBS-0109.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids

This oil is specially designed for oil mist type cutting systems and where non-staining properties are required. HPCL-LBS-0110.title: TRIMOFIN GR
HPCL-LBS-0110.subTitle: Metal Working Fluids
HPCL-LBS-0110.description: Colourless, waterwhite aliphatic solvent, the low sulfur and low aromatic contents make it suitable for use in wide range of applications like granite cutting , lapping , grinding and other surface finishing opeartions.

HPCL-LBS-0111.title: CEMOL 35, N35
HPCL-LBS-0111.subTitle: MOULD OILS

HPCL-LBS-0111.appData: All types of concrete moulds with normal as well as intricate surfaces including hume pipes.

HPCL-LBS-0112.title: GLAMOL 40
HPCL-LBS-0112.subTitle: MOULD OILS
HPCL-LBS-0112.description: Glass mould release agent which does not leave any residue on the glass even at high operating temperatures. Can be used in certain types of ceramic industry as well.
HPCL-LBS-0112.appData: Mould lubricant used for preparation of all types of glass articles. Application can be done by mechanical/automatic spraying or with swab.

HPCL-LBS-0113.title: HP METAQUENCH 39, 40
HPCL-LBS-0113.subTitle: Quenching Oils
HPCL-LBS-0113.description: These quenching oils are blends of refined base oils and contain no additives. HP METAQUENCH 39 is recommended for general purpose quenching of components and is particularly suitable for quenching of cyanided parts. HP METAQUENCH 40 is suitable in situations when lower quenching speed is desired.
HPCL-LBS-0113.appData: HP METAQUENCH 39 is a general-purpose quenching oil of all components including cyanided parts HP METAQUENCH 40 is a general-purpose quenching oil of all components.

HPCL-LBS-0114.title: HP METAQUENCH 42
HPCL-LBS-0114.subTitle: Quenching Oils
HPCL-LBS-0114.description:
General purpose compounded quenching oil suitable for quenching of components for conditions when higher quenching speeds are required.

This is a blend of highly refined petroleum base stocks with high quality fatty oils .The heat transfer characteristics of the petroleum base stocks are enhanced by the presence of the high quality fatty oil with its inherent wetting ability. Its quenching speed is higher as compared to Metaquench 39, and Metaquench 40. Metaquench 42 is recommended for general purpose quenching operations It is,however, not recommended for quenching of cyanided parts. Metaquench 42 meets the requirement of IS 2664 -1980 ( Re-affrmend in 1993 )Compounded Type Quenching Oil.
HPCL-LBS-0114.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components. However, this oil is not suitable for quenching cyanided parts.

HPCL-LBS-0115.title: HP METAQUENCH 43
HPCL-LBS-0115.subTitle: Quenching Oils
HPCL-LBS-0115.description:
Quenching oil with excellent dispersant properties. The oil is fortified with carefully selected dispersant to provide minimum quench distortion.

This is an additive type of quenching oil with good dispersant properties and excellent heat transfer characteristics. The special additive incorporated in this oil controls soiling of the metal parts during quenching by preventing dirt from accumulating on the metal, thus ensuring uniform hardness with minimum quench distortions. It meets the requirement of IS 2664 Additive Type quenching oil.
HPCL-LBS-0115.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components. Suitable for applications where dirt accumulation on the metal is a bane

HPCL-LBS-0116.title: HP METAQUENCH 44
HPCL-LBS-0116.subTitle: Quenching Oils
HPCL-LBS-0116.description: Quenching oil with excellent dispersant properties. The oil is fortified with carefully selected dispersant to provide minimum quench distortion.Cooling rates are markedly faster enabling achievement of higher surface hardness.
HPCL-LBS-0116.appData: General purpose quenching oil of all components. Suitable for applications where dirt accumulation on the metal is a bane and where higher surface hardness is required.

HPCL-LBS-0117.subTitle: Quenching Oils

HPCL-LBS-0121.subTitle: Quenching Oils
